DESCRIPTION: When a card with Echo is drawn, create a copy of it with Ethereal and Exhaust.
Stored cards are returned to your hand when it is empty. Cards returned this way cost 0 this turn. Up to 3 cards can be stored at a time.
At the end of your turn, enemies gain 1 Distress for every 5 Distress they have.
The enemy loses HP equal to their Distress, then loses all Distress.
